 (Center 2) Present for Enterprise customers in 2013 1. Eligibility : Enterprise customers that have at least 2 subscriptions with the billing address in Center 2, and have the average monthly billing amount in September, October and November, 2013 of: Type 1: > VND3.000.000 /cycle. Type 2: 2. Content : MobiFone's staff will come to customer's billing address to bring a physical present, specifically: Type 1: Customers will receive a 30cm crystal flower vase or a 35cm colorful crystal plate. 1 set of "Thank you" greeting card Present will be contained in a red bag, with MobiFone's logo printed on both sides. Type 2: Customers will receive a set of 6 290ml golden-lined whisky glasses or a set of 2 150ml white bowls with caps 1 set of "Thank you" greeting card Present will be contained in a red bag, with MobiFone's logo printed on both sides. 3. Time : Expectedly from 20th December, 2013 to 31st January, 2014 2013 &#24180;&#20225;&#19994;&#23458;&#25143;&#31036;&#21697;&#36192;&#36865;&#27963;&#21160; &#65288;&#20013;&#24515;&#20108;&#65289; 2013 1. &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6038;&#6072;
